did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle:
Britton Harris papers,
1952-1988
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Articles and other publications by Britton Harris on land use development, transportation, use of computers, and various other topics in planning and regional science.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: A city planner, Britton Harris is Emeritus Professor of Planning at the University of Pennsylvania.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Articles and other publications by Britton Harris on land use development, transportation, use of computers, and various other topics in planning and regional science. Part of Regional Science Archives.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Britton Harris Papers, #4255. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
